response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize the way you operate in your field. This product offers unparalleled efficiency and innovation, tailored specifically to meet the needs of professionals like yourself. We believe its value exceeds $12,000 and it could potentially save you time, resources, and enhance your productivity significantly. Considering its unique features and benefits, we're offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your business operations. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 15000}
